title: A Grain of sand
creator_credit: David Keith Hardy, John Luck and UNICEF
brief_description: Firstly children’s needs are dramatised through a poem by William Blake and drawings by Ronald Searle. Then we follow a 10 year old Tunisian Arab boy to a health clinic, a school and a vocational training centre - three concrete ways to help meet children’s needs.
